mapper.select: select * from users where roleId=0 and mobileNum = #{id} or wcId = #{id}

select u.name as userName, k.name as kidName, e.name as eventName, e.stage as stage, et.name as eventTypeName, s.name as serieName, e.eventTime as eventTime, a.rank as rank, a.score as score, cr.credit as credit, cr.goldenMedal as goldenMedal, cr.silverMedal as silverMedal, cr.bronzeMedal as bronzeMedal from creditRecords cr, users u, kids k, events e, eventTypes et, series s, attendees a where e.eventTypeId=et.id and s.eventTypeId = et.id and a.eventId=cr.eventId and a.kidId=k.id and k.userId=cr.userId and e.id=cr.eventId and cr.userId=u.id and cr.userId = #{id}

insert users (id, name, password, mobileNum, location, roleId,status,siteId, createdTime, lastModifiedTime) values (#{id},#{name},#{password},#{mobileNum},#{location},#{roleId},#{status},#{siteId},now(),now())
update users set name=#{name}, mobileNum=#{mobileNum}, location=#{location}, roleId=#{roleId}, siteId=#{siteId}, status=#{status}, credit=#{credit} where id = #{id};
